data.title: Thomas Thurston
data.text:
Thurston is a managing director in the corporate & venture services group at Piper Sandler. Previously, he was a principal of Sandler O’Neill + Partners, L.P. where he was the head trader on the equity desk. He worked closely with corporate clients on structuring and managing corporate share repurchase programs.

Thurston began his career at Merrill Lynch & Co where he was a director in the firm’s corporate and institutional client group focusing on trading stocks in the financial services sector.

Thurston holds a bachelor’s degree from Gettysburg College.
